title: Assign a Trouble Ticket at the Gate
description: A gate kiosk's printer stops working. The clerk needs to report the issue.

tasks.description: Identify that the printer at Lane 3 is not working.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk recognizes the hardware failure.

tasks.description: Create a new trouble ticket in the IT helpdesk system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new ticket is created with the problem description 'Printer not working' and location 'Gate Lane 3'.

tasks.description: Assign the ticket to the on-site hardware support team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ticket is assigned to the correct support queue for resolution.
